name: notrace
description: Probing and monitoring library based on AMQP.
author: Ricardo Stuven <rstuven@gmail.com>

scripts.bin: mkdir bin && echo #!/usr/bin/env node | cat - ./lib/cli.js > ./bin/notrace && rm ./lib/cli.js && chmod +x ./bin/notrace
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run js && npm run bin
scripts.test: npm run all && mocha -R spec --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register
